data.persona: I fight the enemy for my hometown. I am trained to fire guns at the enemy. I spend a lot of time away from home.
data.description:
You are in the Watchtower.
The tower is the largest section of the castle. It contains an observatory for nighttime scouting, but is also used by the wise men to study the stars. Armed guardsmen are always to be found keeping watch.
There's an alarm horn here.
The armed guardsmen is here.

You are carrying a family heirloom, and wearing an armor and a sword.

data.short_motivation: I want to gather the guardsmen.
data.mid_motivation: I want to organize a battle.
data.long_motivation: I want to be prepared for the great war next year.
